trans-unit.source: The content elements are accessible in an accordion
Open a specific accordion tile when loading
Close accordions when an accordion element is selected / Accordions stay open
Choose the accordion tile, wich should be opened
Puts a local or external audio on the page
Adds a banner element with optional image, link and background color
Container covering the entire page or screen width
Inserts a gallery element as a single image preview, tiles or slider
Drag grid container across the entire width
Switch font-color from dark to light
Add a background image to the container.
Choose how many columns the grid will be divided into
Create a grid with any number of elements.
Move out, add padding to element and add optional icon
Insert icon at the top left of the container
Add a parallax animation to the background image.
Slide or Fade (Fade only in one column)
Choose whether elements are in a list or in containers
Link Icon for the page navigation, e.g. for accessible link.
Only one main category can be selected and will be displayed alone or next to the date.
Short text that can be displayed in teasers to this page
Adds a teaser with headline, image, text and link element
Specify the first color in the selection field here.
Specify the name for the first color in the selection field here.
Specify the second color in the selection field here.
Specify the name for the second color in the selection field here.
Specify the third color in the selection field here.
Specify the name for the third color in the selection field here.
Specify the fourth color in the selection field here.
Specify the name for the fourth color in the selection field here.
Specify the fifth color in the selection field here.
Specify the name for the fifth color in the selection field here.
Specify the sixth color in the selection field here.
Specify the name for the sixth color in the selection field here.
Specify the seventh color in the selection field here.
Specify the name for the seventh color in the selection field here.
Specify the eighth color in the selection field here.
Specify the name for the eighth color in the selection field here.
Set the primary page color here.
Set the quaternary page color here.
Set the secondary page color here. You should also set a transparency value here.
Set the secondary page color here.
Set the tertiary page color here.
This selection switch activates all colors below it. If it is turned off, no color is passed on to the frontend. When it is turned on, only the filled colors are passed on.
In the footer, the copyright notice is displayed with a © sign and the current year.
The PNG file has to be square in 180x180 pixel. Filename must be 'apple-touch-icon.png'.
The PNG file has to be square in 48x48 pixel. Filename must be 'favicon-48x48.png'.
The PNG file has to be square in 48x48 pixel. Filename must be 'favicon-96x96.png'.
The classic Ico file must be square and have a size of 48x48 pixels. Filename must be 'favicon.ico'.
The SVG touch icon must be square and have a size of 512x512 pixels. Filename must be 'favicon.svg'.
The PNG file has to be square in 192x192 pixel. Filename must be 'web-app-manifest-192x192.png'.
The PNG file has to be square in 512x512 pixel. Filename must be 'web-app-manifest-512x512.png'.
The Webmanifest file must first be customized according to your preferences. The file name must be “site.webmanifest”.
Logo for mobile and sticky header view
The text or claim to the right of the logo
Customise the page navigation type here.
Use search on the website. Adds a search field next to the main navigation.
Toggle the social media bar in the footer on or off.
You can make further individual CSS adjustments here. However, you should do this with caution.
Adds a column with subnavigation to the article template.
Arrange subnavigation on the left (off) or right (on).
Change font and link color from light to dark.
Please activate this option if the file (PDF) is accessible.
The content elements are accessible through tabs
Open a specific tab when loading
Select the number of columns the grid will be divided into.
The kicker is part of the headline and is displayed as a chip above the headline.
Set the heading depth of the teaser. The default is “H2”.
When activated, an additional link text or button is displayed, which can be given various link or button styles. Default: Internal link “Read more”
Puts a local or external YouTube video on the page
Interactive to-do list built with Vue 3. Add, complete, and manage tasks with filtering and session storage.
Enable delete button for individual tasks
Enable button to clear all completed tasks
Enter one task per line. These tasks will appear when the to-do list is first loaded (if session storage is empty).
